Class FileTree

  • java.lang.Object
    • Analyzer.Model.FileTree
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Analyzer

    public class FileTree
extends java.lang.Object
implements Analyzer
    Class which represent the file system Tree.

    valentin

      • buildFileTree

        public java.util.concurrent.Future<javax.swing.tree.DefaultMutableTreeNode> buildFileTree(java.lang.String rootPath,
                                                                                          Filter filter,
                                                                                          java.lang.Boolean hash,
                                                                                          java.lang.Boolean recordInCache,
                                                                                          int maxDepth)
        Builder of the File Tree
        Specified by:
        buildFileTree in interface Analyzer
        Parameters:
        rootPath - String representation of the root path
        filter - Filter used to check files
        hash - Boolean, equals true for hashing files on tree building, false either
        recordInCache - Boolean, equals true for saving tree files on cache.
        Returns:
        The DefaultMutableTreeNode root of the Tree in a thread result object.

        recordInCache - Boolean, equals true for saving tree files on cache.
        Returns:
        The DefaultMutableTreeNode root of the Tree in a thread result object.
